translations: 无生殖能力的，不育的；无菌的，消过毒的；（争论或讨论）毫无新意的，无结果的；（建筑、房间等）呆板的，乏味的；（土地）贫瘠的，不长作物的

sentences.sentence: He was able to bring large sterile acreages back to fertility.
sentences.translation: 他能把大片不毛之地变回沃土。

sentences.sentence: He always made sure that any cuts were protected by sterile dressings.
sentences.translation: 他总是确保所有伤口都用无菌的敷料包好。

sentences.sentence: This top fits over the bottle and keeps the teat sterile.
sentences.translation: 这个盖子盖在瓶子上，保持奶嘴无菌。
